      • loadPodFromTemplate

        protected io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1PodTemplateSpec loadPodFromTemplate​(boolean isExecutor)
        Initiates the process of locating and loading Pod Template from a ConfigMap. The loaded text is then parsed into a usable Pod Template.
        Parameters:
        isExecutor - Flag to indicate loading of Pod Template for Executor or Manager.
        Returns:
        A Pod Template which is loaded and parsed from a ConfigMap.

      • getPodTemplateLocation

        protected Pair<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getPodTemplateLocation​(boolean isExecutor)
        Extracts the ConfigMap and Pod Template names from the CLI parameter.
        Parameters:
        isExecutor - Flag to indicate loading of Pod Template for Executor or Manager.
        Returns:
        A pair of the form (ConfigMap, Pod Template).

      • getConfigMap

        protected io.kubernetes.client.openapi.models.V1ConfigMap getConfigMap​(java.lang.String configMapName)
        Retrieves a ConfigMap from the K8s cluster in the API Server's namespace.
        Parameters:
        configMapName - Name of the ConfigMap to retrieve.
        Returns:
        The retrieved ConfigMap.

      • getPersistentVolumeClaimLabels

        protected static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.String> getPersistentVolumeClaimLabels​(java.lang.String topologyName)
        Generates the Label which are attached to a Topology's Persistent Volume Claims.
        Parameters:
        topologyName - Attached to the topology match label.
        Returns:
        A map consisting of the label-value pairs to be used in Labels.
